actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to abolish the U.S. Postal Service, to repeal the Postal Reorganization Act, to reenact the former provisions of title 39, United States Code.

summary.text: Authorizes the Attorney General to exchange criminal record information with State and local agencies, where such State and local agencies are authorized by their laws and regulations to acquire such information in the performance of their official duties and functions.

titles.title: A bill to abolish the U.S. Postal Service, to repeal the Postal Reorganization Act, to reenact the former provisions of title 39, United States Code.
